title: How Many Calories in Flour?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in flour per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for all-purpose flour.
assumptions: All-purpose white flour, sifted, unenriched; standard refined wheat flour.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (e.g., whole wheat, bleached), brand, enrichment, and processing. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of all-purpose flour provides about 364 kcal, primarily from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of flour?
faqs.a: About 455 kcal for 1 cup (125g) of all-purpose flour.
Yes, 76g carbs per 100g, mostly starch with low fiber (2.7g).
Around 10g protein per 100g of all-purpose flour.

faqs.q: Calories in whole wheat vs white flour?
faqs.a: Whole wheat has ~340 kcal per 100g, slightly less than white flour's 364 kcal.

faqs.q: Does flour have fat or cholesterol?
